name: Sell Surplus
brief: Trade resources for gold based on commerce structure tier
description: Convert excess resources into gold through your kingdom's commerce infrastructure. Better commerce structures provide better trade rates. Requires at least one commerce structure (Market Square, Bazaar, Merchant Guild, or Imperial Bank).

criticalSuccess.description: Use trade rate one tier higher than your commerce structure (e.g., Market Square → Bazaar rate). Imperial Bank achieves legendary 1:3 rate!

success.description: Use your current commerce structure's trade rate (Market Square: 2:1, Bazaar: 3:2, Merchant Guild: 1:1, Imperial Bank: 1:2)

special: Trade a single resource type for gold. Amounts must be divisible by your trade ratio (e.g., with 3:2 rate, trade in sets of 3). Commerce tier determines rate: T1 Market Square (2:1) → T2 Bazaar (3:2) → T3 Merchant Guild (1:1) → T4 Imperial Bank (1:2) → Bonus Tier (1:3, critical success only)
